title: Supreme Court stays out of Trump advisor's fight to keep White House emails
shortDescription: Peter Navarro, a trade advisor to President-elect Donald Trump, does not want to give the National Archives all his work-related emails from the first Trump administration.

title: Does Trump support gay marriage? Here's what he's said
shortDescription: Donald Trump has had varying views on gay marriage in recent decades. Here's what to know ahead of his inauguration in 2025.

title: Trump team wants to scrap car crash requirement opposed by Elon Musk's Tesla
shortDescription: The Trump transition team wants the incoming administration to drop a car-crash reporting requirement opposed by Elon Musk’s Tesla.

title: Trump loyalist Richard Grenell named envoy for special missions
shortDescription: A U.S. ambassador and acting national intelligence chief in Trump's first administration, Grenell has also sparked controversy.

title: Trump picks Truth Social CEO Nunes to lead intelligence board
shortDescription: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday named ally Devin Nunes to serve as chairman of President's Intelligence Advisory Board.

title: ABC to pay $15M to Trump library to settle lawsuit, documents show
shortDescription: ABC News has agreed to give $15 million to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump’s presidential library to settle a lawsuit.

title: Trump, RFK Jr. set sights on childhood vaccines program, autism
shortDescription: Skyrocketing rates of autism have led some to implicate childhood vaccines, though research has consistently cleared the shots.

title: South Korea's Yoon defiant after impeachment over martial law bid
shortDescription: The Constitutional Court will decide whether to remove Yoon sometime in the next six months. If he is removed from office, a snap election will be called.

title: Trump has plan for drone problem: Shoot em down!
shortDescription: Sen. Andy Kim, D-NJ, went to Hunterdon County to observe drones and reported that he met with local law enforcement at Round Valley Reservoir.

title: How Biden is trying to Trump-proof his legacy
shortDescription: Before giving way to Donald Trump, President Biden is daring the GOP to eliminate his biggest wins and trying to take actions to preserve his agenda.

title: No, Canada did not bar Donald Trump from entering | Fact check
shortDescription: Donald Trump's felony convictions do not mean the president-elect must stay out of Canada. Visiting may just require additional paperwork.

title: Hello darkness? Trump announces push to end daylight saving time
shortDescription: President-elect Trump vowed to work to eliminate daylight saving time, calling it "inconvenient" and "very costly."

title: It’s Beau, not Hunter, in 1973 photo of Biden taking oath | Fact check
shortDescription: The image shows Biden’s son Beau, not Hunter. It was taken in 1973 when Biden was sworn in to the Senate in a Delaware hospital.

title: OpenAI joins other tech leaders in donating to Trump inauguration
shortDescription: Altman's announcement comes after both Meta and Amazon announced plans to contribute $1 million to the inauguration.
